description.en: For this task, the player needs to get a stone hoe with a unbreaking enchantment level of not less than level 1.
description.ru: For this task, the player needs to get a stone hoe with a unbreaking enchantment level of not less than level 1.
description.zh: 对于该任务，需要玩家获得一把耐久附魔等级不小于1级的石锄。

description.en: For this reward, the player will be given 1 stone hoe with unbreaking 3 and named "The Best Stone Hoe" when receiving it.
description.ru: For this reward, the player will be given 1 stone hoe with unbreaking 3 and named "The Best Stone Hoe" when receiving it.
description.zh: 对于该奖励，在领取时会给玩家1把耐久3，名为“The Best Stone Hoe”的石锄。

text.en: Items and icons can have extra attributes added to them.
text.ru: Items and icons can have extra attributes added to them.
text.zh: 物品和图标可以添加extra属性。
